Key: Come now, darling. Go on a date with me.
Hehe... Shido, you can't run at this point.

Recommendation. Please give it up, Shido.
Shido belongs to Kaguya and Yuzuru.

Shido, you'll go on a date with me!
Right, Shido?

No. Shido has promised to spend secret time
after school with me.
Ahhh! What do I do?!
(I guess I have no choice but to run for it!)
Ahhh, darling! Where are you going?!
Wait, Shido!
No! Sorry, everyone!
*Pant, pant*... This far should be good enough.
My... There you are, Shido-san.
What...?! K-Kurumi?!

(Kurumi Tokisaki. She, too, is a Spirit.
But unlike the others, we haven't sealed her.)

(Fortunately, she's integrated into society and
from time to time will visit this town.)

(I thought she'd be after my powers, but she
cooperates with me, too. I can't tell if she's
an ally or an enemy. She's very dangerous...)
What a coincidence.
What are you doing here?
Do I have to explain? It's a girl's secret.

You'd better not have been spying on me until
now...
Hm, I wonder...? Hehe...
...You're creepy, as always.
How rude. I am just a sweet, adorable girl.
I-I guess you're right, but...

(I just can't help but feel like she's creepy...
I don't know what she's thinking.)
Oh, you're not going to deny it?
...?! Well, um...
You don't have to. That makes me very happy.
O-Okay... So Kurumi, are you the real one?

(Kurumi has the ability to manipulate time and
call her past self. There are many versions of
her, so this may not be the real her.)
Why don't you see for yourself?
H-How?

How, indeed... I suppose if you look inside my
skirt, you may know.
How does that help me know?!
My, my... You're bright red, aren't you?
You're so interesting.
I'm not interesting at all!
Hehe...
Anyways... You better not have hurt anyone.

(Kurumi is the only Spirit that kills of her own
volition. I've witnessed it myself. I never want
to remember that moment.)

Hehe... Who knows? Maybe I was in the middle
of buying myself time.
You know...

Hehe, I'm only kidding. I was lucky today and
bumped into you so I'm going to go home
happy.

I see. Is it really okay...? I feel like we
didn't resolve anything.
Hehe... Then I'll be leaving...
Hey, Kurumi!
Good day, Shido-san.

If she were just like this, she'd be a normal
girl...
(...I guess I'll go home, too.)
